definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1"/><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.05</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><value name="block"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="entity_set_mainhand_item"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.VOID_AIR</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="spawn_gem"><value name="block"><block type="entity_iteminoffhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="entity_set_offhand_item"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.VOID_AIR</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
